name: Workbench
description: Learn and prototype with Vala and other GNOME technologies

name: Dino
description: A modern open-source chat client for the desktop. Focuses on providing a clean and reliable Jabber/XMPP experience while having your privacy in mind.

name: Monitor
description: Manage processes and monitor system resources

name: TextSnatcher
description: Copy Text from Images with ease, Perform OCR operations in seconds.

name: Timeshift
description: System restore tool for Linux. Creates filesystem snapshots using rsync+hardlinks, or BTRFS snapshots.

name: Crown
description: Crown is a complete and cross-platform game engine designed for flexibility, performance, and fast-iterations.
